title: Dropping Out and Aquaman - The GameOverGreggy Show Ep. 65
description:
Greg Miller reacts to the Aquaman DCU reveal poster, Colin Moriarty wants to know what proof you would need to know there is a God, Nick Scarpino asks Greg about his insane wrestling history, and the boys discuss the importance of college for YouTubers. (Released 02.27.15)
